name: NATIONAL MEDICINAL CANNABIS COALITION
description: A coalition to advance cannabis-related regulatory changes
sampleDescriptions: Educate Members of Congress on Section 280e of the Internal Revenue Code and supported reforms to Section 280e; monitor COVID-19 relief proposals for cannabis-related tax provisions.
Support H.R. 1996, the SAFE Banking Act; monitor legislation to improve access to banking services for the cannabis industry.
Monitor pending legislation on cannabis reform.
